headline: Can you start a modern-era digital transformation business from just INR 4000?
description:
On January 11, 2018, out of the blue, Pharoscion (pharoscion.com) got a call from Noble Park, Australia. The call came from the owner of an e-commerce portal, seeking assistance for his online business. The agency accepted the offer without hesitation and with the assistance of a web developer, delivered the solution flawlessly. As we know, if you complete a project neatly and long before the deadline, it creates the necessary buzz leading to more and more projects in the pipeline from different clients. And that’s exactly how Pharoscion Global became a modern-era digital transformation agency with a global presence—a bootstrapped agency profitably running the business. Without taking any funding from any investor, the agency has been able to make its footmarks in Australia, Nepal, India, the UK, and the USA and is now trying to embark on its journey in other countries as well.

Pharoscion Global is a cloud and analytics-based digital transformation agency that focuses on the modern-era needs of businesses and startups. With a team comprising minds from IITs, IIMs and other experienced scholars, Pharoscion is your partner in areas (not limited to) like Cloud-based IT Products and Services, Digital Marketing, Branding, Data Analytics, SEO/SEM, as well as in Creative and Ads. Since January 2018, the agency has been following the "4Cs" strategy: curiosity, curation, commercial, and commencement, which has helped ventures achieve 10x growth. Just like any other business enthusiast, we too are passionate about changing the world for the better.

Just the way Pharos, "The Lighthouse of Alexandria City," was built to help guide ships into port and Julius Caesar, in his Civil Wars (Part III, 111-112), describes the strategic importance as, "Now because of the narrowness of the strait, there can be no access by ship to the harbor without the consent of those who hold the Pharos." Likewise, in the 21st century, every Pharoscion has pledged to help businesses globally.

This journey has started with just INR 4000. Yes, that is the exact amount the agency spent on its very first project, bestowed by the Australian company – Everstore Australia Pty Ltd. This success is the result of the combined efforts of every Pharoscion. After helping Everstore Australia with its other portals (Evertyres.com.au, Everstore.com.au, Everracer.com.au), one of its Pharoscion co-founded The Pizza Central, a franchised based pizzeria chain. Pharoscion Global provides services in the areas of Digital Marketing, Branding, Software for Cafe Management, Business Development and Sales, Content and Copywriting, Website and App Development for The Pizza Central. When the winning streak continued for The Pizza Central, the agency expanded its business deliverables to the next level by launching multiple cloud-based apps like Food Khazaana, King Mechanic, PharoAssist, PharoBill, Branding and Digital Marketing, and tech products like ERP and CRM Solutions for big companies, which are running in multiple countries successfully.

With a vision of being the Pharos of the 21st century for to-be and existing brands, Pharoscion Global also geared up to team up with various prestigious institutes of India like IIMs and IITs with its flagship internship program, "Get Hands Dirty." By collaborating with Dadheech International Trade Foundation, Brahmani Welfare Foundation, Sounds of Nidra, and many schools, it is doing its part in uplifting society and humanity.

With a hybrid work culture since inception, the agency is helping as many ideas as possible to become successful start-ups and businesses with its state-of-the-art solutions in areas like cloud computing, data analytics, software and web development, marketing, branding, and artist management. In this pursuit of excellence, it has also collaborated with its global partners – NxtGen, HostingRaja, and 3dotcommunication – and firmly believes in making Pharoscion Global a brand that people around the world trust.
headline_zh-Hans: 只需4000印度卢比就能启动现代的数字转型业务吗？
headline_zh-Hant: 只需4000印度盧比就能啟動現代的數字轉型業務嗎？
description_zh-Hans:
2018年1月11日，突然间，Pharoscion（pharoscion.com）接到一个来自澳大利亚诺贝尔公园的电话。这个电话来自一个电子商务门户网站的所有者，为他的在线业务寻求援助。该机构毫不犹豫地接受了这个提议，并在一名网络开发人员的协助下，完美地交付了解决方案。正如我们所知，如果你在截止日期前整齐地完成了一个项目，它就会产生必要的轰动效应，导致不同客户的项目越来越多。这正是Pharoscion Global成为一个具有全球影响力的现代数字转型机构的方式--一个自筹资金经营业务的机构。在没有任何投资者的资助下，该机构已经在澳大利亚、尼泊尔、印度、英国和美国站稳了脚跟，现在也正试图在其他国家开始它的旅程。

Pharoscion Global是一家基于云和分析的数字转型机构，专注于企业和创业公司的现代需求。Pharoscion拥有一支由来自IITs、IIMs和其他经验丰富的学者组成的团队，在基于云的IT产品和服务、数字营销、品牌、数据分析、SEO/SEM以及创意和广告等领域（不限于此）是您的合作伙伴。自2018年1月以来，该机构一直遵循"4C"战略：好奇心、策展、商业和启动，帮助企业实现10倍增长。就像其他商业爱好者一样，我们也热衷于改变世界，使之更美好。

就像亚历山大城的灯塔Pharos一样，建造灯塔是为了帮助引导船只入港，凯撒大帝在他的《内战》（第三部分，111-112）中描述其战略重要性："现在由于海峡狭窄，没有Pharos持有者的同意，船只无法进入港口。 " 同样，在21世纪，每一个法螺号都承诺帮助全球的企业。

这段旅程从仅仅4000印度卢比开始。是的，这就是该机构在其第一个项目上花费的确切金额，由澳大利亚公司--Everstore Australia Pty Ltd授予。这一成功是每一个Pharoscion人共同努力的结果。在帮助Everstore Australia建立其他门户网站（Evertyres.com.au、Everstore.com.au、Everracer.com.au）之后，Pharoscion的一名员工共同创建了The Pizza Central，一个基于特许经营的比萨店连锁。Pharoscion Global为The Pizza Central提供数字营销、品牌推广、咖啡馆管理软件、业务开发和销售、内容和文案写作、网站和应用程序开发等方面的服务。当The Pizza Central的连胜势头持续时，该机构将其业务交付品扩展到了新的水平，推出了多个基于云的应用程序，如Food Khazaana、King Mechanic、PharoAssist、PharoBill、品牌和数字营销，以及大公司的ERP和CRM解决方案等技术产品，这些产品在多个国家成功运行。

以成为21世纪的法罗斯为愿景，为即将成立的和现有的品牌提供服务，Pharoscion Global还准备与印度的各种著名学院，如IIM和IITs合作，开展其旗舰实习计划 "Get Hands Dirty"。 通过与Dadheech国际贸易基金会、Brahmani福利基金会、Sounds of Nidra和许多学校合作，它正在为提高社会和人类的地位尽自己的一份力量。

自成立以来，该机构以混合的工作文化，通过其在云计算、数据分析、软件和网络开发、营销、品牌和艺术家管理等领域的先进解决方案，帮助尽可能多的想法成为成功的初创企业和业务。在这种追求卓越的过程中，它还与全球合作伙伴--NxtGen、HostingRaja和3dotcommunication合作，并坚信将Pharoscion Global打造成全世界人民信任的品牌。

這段旅程從僅僅4000印度盧比開始。是的，這就是該機構在其第一個項目上花費的確切金額，由澳大利亞公司--Everstore Australia Pty Ltd授予。這一成功是每一個Pharoscion人共同努力的結果。在幫助Everstore Australia建立其他門戶網站（Evertyres.com.au、Everstore.com.au、Everracer.com.au）之後，Pharoscion的一名員工共同創建了The Pizza Central，一個基於特許經營的比薩店連鎖。Pharoscion Global為The Pizza Central提供數字營銷、品牌推廣、咖啡館管理軟件、業務開發和銷售、內容和文案寫作、網站和應用程序開發等方面的服務。當The Pizza Central的連勝勢頭持續時，該機構將其業務交付品擴展到了新的水平，推出了多個基於雲的應用程序，如Food Khazaana、King Mechanic、PharoAssist、PharoBill、品牌和數字營銷，以及大公司的ERP和CRM解決方案等技術產品，這些產品在多個國家成功運行。
